title: Google starts beta testing Pixel Feature Drops with Android 12 QPR3 Beta 1
content:
Google has defied the usual release cycle for new Android updates over the past few months, with the release of Android 12L earlier this month while the first Developer Previews for Android 13 are also available. Now the company is throwing us through another loop: Google is starting to beta test its Pixel Feature Drops.

The post Google starts beta testing Pixel Feature Drops with Android 12 QPR3 Beta 1 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is updating Pixel devices with the Android 12 beta to a new Android 12 QPR3 Beta 1 release, instead of the stable Android 12 release.
